servinfo.title: Vehicle speed can not be set

item.ptxt: Before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis, perform cruise control system check referring to Cruise Control System Check:J24B and N32A Model .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Vehicle speed can not be set

action.ptxt: Check MAIN (ON/OFF) switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check brake light switch for function referring to Brake Light Switch Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Check CPP switch for function referring to CPP Switch (for Cruise Control) Inspection and Adjustment:J24B and N32A Model .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
